name: Angry Wolf
description:
We all know the story of the three little pigs. However this time, the wolf is smart enough to use modern tools for the job. Rebuild your house or be eaten!

Angry Wolf is a four player asymmetrical local coop game, where the three little pigs need to rebuild their house before the time limit. However, the wolf will certainly make their task harder, shooting them with all sort of projectiles.

Made during the global game jam 2020 at ISART Montreal.

Credit

  • Manu Boucher: Audio
  • Alexandre Demouy: Programmer, Design
  • Etienne Gonthier: Programmer, Design
  • Youssef Jazmati: Art, Design
  • Patrick Paquin : Art, Design
  • Hugo Stindel: Programmer, Design
